item.title: SAN (Static Actors)
item.description: The SAN file is what stores all of the games static actors. A static actor is mapped to a LPD fileto handle that given actors logic. Table of contents Table of contents File Information File Header File Format Script section File Information Location: $GAMEDIR/client/script Extensions: san Encrypted File Name: rq9q1797qvs.san Decrypted File Name: StaticActor.
